Sparkle Unicode Pre-Processor - Changes list

Release History

VersionDateDescription
3.22011-12-25upgrade release
1.02011-06-08First release

Release 3.2 - 2011-12-25

TypeChangesBy

Reorganizing/Restructering of the multi module project, to better fit maven 3 requirements. Removed redundancies from POMs, improved performance, switched to maven version of fluido-skin. An incomplete list of the modifications: - Clean up of resources - added target dir to ignore list - fixed relative links - reorganized changelist - added site schema - added missing reports in each module - moved external links to links section - corrected dependencies - ...Simone,Tripodi

Multiple occurences of 'u' in the Unicode escape sequence allowed, as is in Java. Example: \u0041 results in 'A' \uuu0041 is also valid and results in 'A'Juergen.Pfundt

Renamed ANTLRUnicodePreprocessorFileStream to SparqlUnicodePreprocessorFileStream Renamed ANTLRUnicodePreprocessorStringStream to SparqlUnicodePreprocessorStringStreamJuergen.Pfundt

Added ANTLRUnicodePreprocessorStringStreamJuergen.Pfundt

Release 1.0 - 2011-06-08

No changes in this release.
